original_text: The flood breaketh out from the inhabitant; even the waters forgotten of the foot: they are dried up, they are gone away from men.
korean_text: 그는 사람이 사는 곳에서 멀리 떠나 갱도를 깊이 뚫고 발길이 닿지 않는 곳 사람이 없는 곳에 매달려 흔들리느니라

sentences.original_text: The flood breaketh out from the inhabitant
even the waters forgotten of the foot
they are gone away from men
